long_description: Lasso Lock II security cable easily secures your kayak to any standard rooftop rack, deterring theft of your watercraft in the driveway or the backcountry. Made with vinyl-coated, super-tough, 3/8-in. galvanized steel cabling for serious protection and peace of mind; total cable length is 16 ft. Integrated tamper-proof barrel lock with combination dials removes the worry of keeping up with keys. Secures in seconds and removes easily with no tools required; can be attached to standard car racks or even to a tree. 16-in. diameter cable loops will accommodate tandem and sit-on-top kayaks. Includes rugged Cordura(TM) nylon storage sack with drawcord closure to keep your Lasso lock clean and tangle free during storage or transport.
short_description: Lasso Lock II security cable easily secures your kayak to any standard rooftop rack, deterring theft of your watercraft in the driveway or the backcountry.
